dmca.title: Merry Prankster Photos to Geocities (#2)
dmca.body:
Pagel - Kana Mail

Name: [private]
Subject: Geocities copyright infringement & others

>> 11/19/03
>> Dear [private],
>> Just talked to you. Here is the geocities copyright infringement
>> information plus other sites.
>> [private]

> TO:
> Yahoo!'s Agent for Notice of claims for copyright and intellectual
> property infringement.
>	Mail:	[private]
	c/o Yahoo! Inc.
> [private]
> Sunnyvale, CA 94089
>	Phone:		[private]
>	Fax:	[private]
>	Email:		[private]
>	FROM:
>	Mail:		[private]
> [private]
> Eugene, OR 97405
> Phone: [private]
> Email: [private]
> November 19, 2003

> I believe this is an appropriate circumstance to disable and terminate
> the account of users who are infringing on my copyright and
> intellectual property rights. I know that my work has been copied in a
> way that constitutes copyright infringement and my intellectual
> property rights have been otherwise violated. I have included the
> following information as required in items 1 - 6.
> Here is a description of the copyrighted work and other intellectual
> property that has been infringed along with a description of where the
> material that is infringing is located on the site-

7 photos: contacted webmaster & it now shows broken images
>	but photos still appear in Yahoo Image Search, please remove.
>	http://www.geocities.com/wickedannabella/keseytx.jpg
>	http://www.geocities.com/wickedannabella/cassady.jpg
>	http://www.geocities.com/wickedannabella/gfetchin.jpg
>	http://www.geocities.com/wickedannabella/capnflag.jpg >>>	http://www.geociLies.com/wickedannabella/cassady2.jpg
>	http://www.geocities.com/wickedannabella/cassady3.jpg
>	http://www.geociLies.com/wickedannabella/gwalker.jpg

>	Under Yahoo Image Search
>	Cassady:

>	www.geocities.com/beatleburn/furtherpix.html/cassady.jpg (Neal
>	w/guitar) www.geocities.com/beatleburn/turtherpix.html/cassady2.jpg
>	(Neal next to bus)
>	www.geocities.com/beatieburn/turtherpix.html/cassady3.jpg (Neal at wheel)

>	Maybe using the 4 other above gifs having just changed their web name
>	from wickedannabella/ to beatleburn/furtherpix.html/. (They both use the number 1 instead of the letter 1.

Here are other sites with copyright infringements.

>	http://archives.waiting-forthe-sun.net/Pages/ArtisticInfluences/Beats/BeatBios/cassady-bio-html
>	1 photo: Neal Cassady at the bus wheel, The Further Inquiry, Pq
>	176,178, 182 & 168

>	http://www.charm.net/~brooklyn/Lists/CassadyQuest.html
>	1 photo: Neal Cassady at the bus wheel, The Further Inquiry, P9
>	176,178, 182 & 188

>	http://home.earthlink.net/~osfavela2002/cyberpunk/cassady5.jpg
>	1 photo: Neal Cassady next to bus, The Further Inquiry, Pg 81

Page 2 - Kana Mail

http://home.earthlink.net/~osfavela2002/cyberpunk/10kenkesey.html
> 2 photos: Neal Cassady next to bus, The Further Inquiry, P9 81
>	Furthur bus sign, On The Bus, P9 182

> http://4.avatarreview.com:8084/pictures/PorchSongs/Kesey.jpg
> 1 photo: Ken Kesey playing clarinet/wearing painted helmet, On The
> Bus, Pg 203

> http://web.syr.edu/~jtburke/keseytopcfbus-jpg
> 1 photo; Ken Kesey on top of bus, The Further Inquiry, Jacket/Book
> Cover, Pg -2 & 28
> http://web.syr.edu/~jtburke/instrumentsinwater.jpg
	1 photo: George Walker w/ clarinet, Ken Babbs w/ sax & John Babbs w/
> trombone in the water playing instruments, The Further Inquiry, P9 112
> & 113

> http://www.gglotus.org/ggtech/elan-larrys/Elanlarl.htm
> 1 photo: George Walker in Lotus, reprinted from enlarged photo

> I have in good faith, believe and know, that the disputed use is not
> authorized by me the copyright and intellectual property owner, its
> agent, or the law. The information in my Notice is accurate and I am
> the copyright and intellectual property owner authorized to act on the
> behalf of my ownership in my copyright and intellectual property.

> Sincerely,
> [private]

Response To: [private]
Subject: Re: Geocities copyright infringement & others

Hello [private],

Unfortunately, there was not enough information in your email for us to provide you with assistance in the most efficient manner. Please reply back to this email with the following information:

	* A statement by you, made *under penalty of perjury*, that the above information in your Notice is accurate and that you are the copyright or intellectual property owner or authorized to act on the copyright or intellectual property owner's behalf.

Once we have this information, we will be able to further investigate.

Regards,

Copyright Agent, Yahoo! Inc.
[private]
c/o Yahoo! Inc.
[private]
Sunnyvale, CA 94089

Original Message Follows:
-------------------------

>>	11/19/03

TO:
Yahoo!'s Agent for Notice of claims for copyright and intellectual property infringement.
Mail:	[private]
	c/o Yahoo! Inc.
[private]
	Sunnyvale, CA 94089
Phone:		[private]
Fax:	[private]
Email:		[private]
FROM:
Mail:	[private]
[private]
Eugene, OR 97405
Phone: [private]
Email: [private]

November 20, 2003

Dear Yahoo! Copyright Department,

	In response to an email received yesterday, 11/19/03 at 3.40 PM, I am faxing a copy of the below statements with the required physical signature.

	These statements are to cover all faxes, emails, this, later and the previous letter already mailed which is dated November 11, 2003.

	1, [private], the copyright and intellectual property owner, have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright and intellectual property owner, its agent or the law.

	Under penalty of perjury, the above information in my Notice is accurate and that I am the copyright and intellectual property owner and/or I am authorized to art on the copyright and intellectual property owner's behalf.

[private]
